description: They've updated the fit of their Men's Merino 250 Base Layer 1/4 Zip to improve functionality while also enhancing aesthetics. As one of their heaviest base layer tops and best base layers for cold weather, this garment uses 100% responsibly sourced Merino wool, shoulder panels, and a flatlock seam construction to help minimize chafing as well as help keep you comfortable and temperature-regulated as you enjoy high-intensity skiing, hiking, running, and more.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal Merino (250) Base Layer 1/4 Zip - Mens
